item.title: Chao Cbow errors!
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

First off, learn the basics of the language you are trying to program. Second, quit stealing peoples work.

In the first 2 errors you must enclose an if statement with ()

For the other 9 errors, you must declare the booleans properBolts and usingCross

Read full topic
